name: Invaders Must Die (chappos)
description:
Created for Major Jam 3: Retro!
This 96x96 retro styled shoot-em-up will see you shooting down enemy starships, weaving through bullet-hell style dangers, and levelling up to upgrade to new and more powerful weapons!

There are three levels to beat. See how high of a rank you can achieve on each!

Music used is not my own. 

Music:

Spirit Cross by Schematist | http://www.schematistmusic.com
Music promoted by https://www.free-stock-music.com
